channel.title: Apt-Get on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Apt-Get on Notes

item.title: Sources List for Debian 8 (Jessie)
item.description: Debian 8 has been superseded by Debian 9 (stretch). Regular security support updates have been discontinued as of June 17th, 2018. Jessie also benefits from Long Term Support (LTS) until the end of June 2020. The LTS is limited to i386, amd64, armel and armhf.

item.title: Sources List for Debian Wheezy
item.description: As Debian wheezy version has reached the end of life, the usual repositories do not exist anymore and have been moved to the archive.
